user_query: I am planning to sell my property in Santa Monica and need assistance in determining the optimal listing price. Can you provide me with the recent sales data and market trends for this area? Additionally, I would like to see the contact information of agents specialized in selling properties in Santa Monica.

TaskList.description: Gather recent sales data for properties in Santa Monica.
Analyze market trends for the Santa Monica real estate market.
Query for contact information of real estate agents specializing in Santa Monica.
Compile the analysis results and contact information into a report.
